The bats retreat as they return to their roosts.  Then, something that Magm=
atron said sparks an idea in Tucsons directory.  What if he could actually =
give Magmatron the grand illusion and make it appear that he would turn on =
his comrades while in reality pulling off the most strategic illusion of be=
trayal and winning his faction a very strategic victory?  Instead of growli=
ng at Magmatron he stops fighting and nods in submission.  

" You win Magm=
atron, I can see that your skills far outweigh my own.  But I can also see =
that in some strange way, we complement each other.  We are both powerful i=
n our own right and if WE wanted to, we could have this planet all to ourse=
lves. "

Straightshots jaw drops as do those of Rattrap and Quickstride.

"=
WHAT?!  NO !  TUCSON ARE YOU CRAZY!?"

Rattrap squeaks in shock.

" YOU CAN=
'T DO THAT WINGS,  YOU'RE BETTER THAN THAT SLAG BALL! "

Quickstride snorts=
.

" IF YOU TURN TAIL ON US NOW WE'RE SLAGGED!  IS HE OUT OF HIS PROCESSOR!=
?"

Tucson turns to face them.   He then says something to Straightshot in =
sign language which she nods to.

" Shhh.... Guys...  It's okay.  He's tryi=
ng something out of the box, way out of the box.   I hope it works.  "

Tuc=
son gives her a wink and then turns back to Magmatron, waiting for his resp=
onse.

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and =
digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occ=
asion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me a=
t this address and we will talk.
